message: Let's be reasonable and divide fairly.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, given that we both have to agree to it.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way forward, and we both get a good amount.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to split it evenly. Time is on my side.
I'm willing to compromise a little more, but I'm not going to give up much more than that. Let's get this done.
You're running out of time, Bob. Inflation is eating away at your share. Take this offer before it's too late.
